website_summaries.verdict: The Jabra Rox is a cleverly designed Bluetooth earphone pair ideal for bass lovers who want to exercise to wireless audio.
pros: Powerful, distortion-free audio performance with deep bass presence
Excellent magnetic earpiece design keeps cable tangle-free, saves battery life
Inline remote control and built-in microphone for mobile device
cons: Lops off the beginning of newly selected tracks
Easy to accidentally dial last person you spoke with
Not for purists seeking flat response

customer_reviews.title: #1 No bass at all these suck. My Sony walkman from the 80's sounded better ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought these based on online reviews well I guess those were from people with no experience in quality sound or QC went all to hell. #1 No bass at all these suck. My Sony walkman from the 80's sounded better than these on AM radio. I thought hey maybe it's just the Bluetooth drivers on her phone that suck let's hook it up to my pixel which drives my sol BT headset like a champ and use power amp to dial it in yea still no bass. #2 they do not stay in your ears while exercising.
customer_reviews.author: J. Myers

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: Their cool. I hate that the wings slide off the ear buds readily. They get caught on my clothes or in my hair then fall off and I lose then. Jabra should put 2 spare packs in the kit. The buds don't stay in my ears too well without the wings. There is a delay between my phone (SG Note 4) and the command buttons on the Bluetooth. You also have to hold down the power button for forever before it powers on. Great sound cancellation and background noise. Music plays nice. However with most bluetooths the other person hears everything in the background.
customer_reviews.author: MizzPenguin

customer_reviews.title: When the headphones stay in they are great. The flaws are the earbud wings get lost ...
customer_reviews.text: When the headphones stay in they are great. The battery life is good, maybe up to 8hrs or more without charge. I like that it warns you before the battery completely dies. The flaws are the earbud wings get lost easily. And while exercising they keep coming off. I have had them for a year and a half and they still last. The sound and base is good. I expected these headphones to be great because they were suggested but the flaw of the buds make them ok.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Great while they worked
customer_reviews.text: I liked these pretty well when they worked but they're not loud enough with regular tips, and just loud enough with comply foam tips. The sound is fine if you're not trying to overpower other sounds though. Remote started working intermittently after only 6 months and finally stopped which means I can't turn them on now. Jabra won't warranty them without the original receipt. I loved the magnetic standby, not only does it stop the music but it also keeps them around your neck.
customer_reviews.author: gaterose

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but after a while
customer_reviews.text: The ear buds are HUGE and a LOT to cram in your ears. You HAVE to use the earwig lock to make it stay in, and that makes it that much more cumbersome. Great sound, but after a while, they become very uncomfortable. Would not buy again, and would prefer to return, but I'm out of time on the return policy. Very unfortunate purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Horrible noise cancellation!
customer_reviews.text: I have had over 15 bt headsets and phone calls on this one are the worst. Horrible noise cancellation. Description says state of the art... Impossible to use for phone calls unless in perfect silence. People on the other side can hear EVERYTHING in the room and have trouble differentiating my voice from room noise. I have asked jabra if they will issue a firmware update. Will update if they respond. Going back to my LG tone platinums. Update: Over a month and still no response from Jabra. Headset is also acting even more wonky and connects on calls only part of the time. Very bad headset given the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality, easy set up and decent battery life for a Bluetooth device. Audio for both calls and music is great. The headset comes with 3 different sets of earwings and jellies for maximum comfort. Each earbud is magnetic which is great. I did not have them in all the way (had not put the earwings on them yet) and they fell out during yard work and snapped into place around my neck rather than falling on the ground which is pretty impressive. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: I wished I bought the Jaybirds. Prob still will buy them.
customer_reviews.text: I had the jaybird freedom prior to buying these and was really sold on the NFC and magnetic features these provide. Sadly I have to say these were not worth the money to me. The Jaybird's ear wings made the headphones solid while being active. I can't seem to get a good fit with these Jabra's. I have tried every earbud and wing combination and these just don't stay in my ears. I have also lost two ear wings due to them falling off. They are not as secure as the Jaybird's.
customer_reviews.author: popo503

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a design flaw with Rox's. I read so many similar stories that people left these unused for couple of days/months and then couldn't get them to charge ever again. They just die. These were expensive set of earbuds and after having such an experience with #Jabra, I seriously doubt if I am ever going to buy any of their products in future. Sukesh +91 91460 42374
customer_reviews.author: sukesh ganda

customer_reviews.title: NEED NEW HEADPHONES NOW
customer_reviews.text: so i got this product a month ago exactly, and loved it. besides the earbuds it coming with always slipping out of my ears during a workout it was good. fast forward to today i take the charger out of the dock and the whole earbud breaks in half exposing the wires. now it wont turn on, it wont light up, it wont charge, and im out 70 bucks. moral of the story, do your research before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent earbuds. The magnetic on/off is ingenious
customer_reviews.text: Excellent earbuds. The magnetic on/off is ingenious. The sound is very good, and the buds stay in my ear reliable, e.g. while running. The small, rubber-coated buttons on the control unit are somewhat hard to operate. I have not experienced any drop-outs of the bluetooth connection that I experienced with the same cell phone with two different headsets, while running.
customer_reviews.author: GG0815

customer_reviews.title: Sounded great for 5 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Sounded great for 5 weeks. Then nothing. Green light shows full charge but no activity when unplugged from wall. Can't get through to Jabra. Amazon won't exchange it. I realize that poor products do slip through QC but the customer service from Amazon and Jabra is not acceptable. I would purchase anything else from anyone else. UPDATE 8/15/16 Jabra reached out to me and replaced the Jabra Rox with minimum hassle. The new ones sound great so I'm giving them 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: TangoZulu

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, hard to get them properly placed in ears
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get this product to stay in my ears without the ear wings...and those are really hard to figure out how to place them on the earpieces. Once you finally figure that out, the sound is very good...not great but very very good.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Williams

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE BUT RETURNING WAS A BREEZE
customer_reviews.text: volume sux app does not work. product was defective, was able to return it so that was great. had the volume worked as far as being loud it would have received a 9 and as far as the app it did not work, no matter how I set the equalizer there was no difference from one setting to the other, including the "DOLBY SETTING"
customer_reviews.author: Freddy Remington

customer_reviews.title: Very sad. I bought a different
customer_reviews.text: The magnetism, sound and volume quality/capabilities are what I will miss.... I really wanted these guys to work. They were too heavy and none of the options possible could make these suckers fit and stay in my ears for more than 5 seconds. Very sad. I bought a different, cheaper brand and they fit perfectly without trouble... what up wit dat?
customer_reviews.author: bbbull

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Well bilt and great sound. This is the 4th one I bought so far some I lost wile traveling and I had bought jay birdx2s but I missed the quality structure of my Jabra Rox so finally bought another one and Ian very happy with them,I also downloaded JabraConnect which works like a charm like a GPS. I won't loose another one.😊
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It took a little to get the sizing of the ear buds and wing flaps, but once I determined the correct size for comfort, the headphones are perfect! the sound is amazing, and the comfort is great! I love the magnetic bud feature that allows them to shut off when not in use (activated by joining the buds together) The battery life is great too! It says estimated 5 hours of music playback, which is good. The Bluetooth setup was fast and easy, I just brought my phone close to the headset when I first connected and through the NFC technology, they joined quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Christofer Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: The wing system is a bad design. Can't really tell where is the right ...
customer_reviews.text: The headphone is impossible to fit. I have to jam the ear buds into my ears in order for it to stay. The cable also too stiff, every time I turn my head it wants to come off. The wing system is a bad design. Can't really tell where is the right spot to the wing on....after a few time of put on and off, the wings are shifted.
customer_reviews.author: Backyardchef

customer_reviews.title: Story of my ROX
customer_reviews.text: Bought these when they were $110. I was pretty scared tbey were not gonna be up to par to my standards,but first time use was amazing. Bass was strong and very clear. The magnetic functin was cool too. Used it during gym and PE at school so sweat is no problem. Towards the 5th month i started to see connection stutter and i would have to turn off and on to fix. I was debating on these or the blubuds x but i dont regret getting these considering theyre cheaper. Sadly i no longer have mine. Left it in my pants, mom took my pants and threw it in the washer and dryer. RIP rox
customer_reviews.author: Cong

customer_reviews.title: Nice bluetooth earbuds
customer_reviews.text: The variety of earbud tips included were nice. I selected the torpedo shaped tips, and they provide a secure fit in combination with the ear wings. The ear wings themselves attach with a stretchy rubber-band like loop that goes around the earbud. The wings tend to slide around and need periodic adjustment. The unit was easy to pair with my phone. The voice prompts are definitely helpful. The sound quality is good, but like all bluetooth audio tends to lose a bit of fidelity at the higher frequencies.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Dibler

customer_reviews.title: The Best Bluetooth Ear Buds on the market period!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best bluetooth ear buds I have ever heard. Just returned some Jay Bird Blue Bud X earbuds because of the poor sound quality and construction. For those who gave these Jabra earbuds a poor review, you have to know how to set your equalizer if you're using a mobile device otherwise you will not experience the full range of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Muniz

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, magnets not so much.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the magnetic on/off function would be really neat until I realized that they come apart and stick together when you jostle them in a bag and that turns them on and off and you go to answer you phone and the call is going to the headphones in your bag... If the magnets were stronger or there was an overall override switch it would be better.
customer_reviews.author: R. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Headsets not designed for runners
customer_reviews.text: These headsets are not met to be for runners. Very poorly designed, headset keeps falling off the ears and easy to loose the gel holders. Lost 2 sets of gel holders in 2 weeks. If you are planning to use these headsets for physical activities please don't buy these headsets.
customer_reviews.author: Anand Adipudi

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit my ears
customer_reviews.text: If you have small ears don't order these. I tried working out with them for a week. They kept falling our of my ears. The fit was terrible. I am sad because I did research and thought I had finally found the wireless earbuds for me. It was so bad I have gone back to the headphones that came with my phone and it sounds better.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Received my pair 2 months ago. Mixed feelings at first trying to find the buds and wings that fit best, or the wings would fall off without realizing and id have to replace. But eventually i really got to liking them. Great sound quality. Then last week they powerd off while i was using them and wont come back on. They light up while being charged. But even at a full charge they wont power back on. Hopefing ill be able to exchange
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this garbage
customer_reviews.text: Complete junk DO NOT BUY. 1st pair didn't work 2nd pair stopped charging would not turn on. Google "Jabra Rox won't turn on" lots of people just out of warrenty with same problem. Company won't replace or help. Should be class action suit.
customer_reviews.author: C McGuiggan

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but should have gone with the BlueBuds...
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth signal / reception is not as strong as it could be. It intermittently cuts out when my phone is just in my pocket. The fit is pretty comfortable, but the ear piece creates such a solid seal that I get pressure build up in my ears when working out. The ear clips also come off a bit too easily and look like they will not last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Ming Wu

customer_reviews.title: Unable to turn on... Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even get to experience how they work, because they didn't. I was able to plug them in and watch the LED come on that it was charging. My phone found the NFC tag and attempted to connect but couldn't because I couldn't turn them on. I was highly disappointed because I was excited to get a new toy . =-( I made the mistake of not reading enough of the one star comments/reviews otherwise I would've saved myself the minor inconvenience of Amazon's awesome return system.
customer_reviews.author: kevin kosovich

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for few weeks now, and regardless which device I pair them to (sony xperia tablet, nokia windows phone, ipod touch, iphone, and samsung galaxy s5) the audio on these cuts out at minimum 3 times per track, frequently more than that. Perhaps this is just the expected performance of bluetooth earbuds, but it's disappointing enough for me that I'm going back to wired earbuds. On the upside, the audio quality between the interruptions is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Sexson

customer_reviews.title: Just Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get these earbuds for the reason of being wireless. Put them In and took a while to find the right combination of buds and wings. But after a while my ear would hurt and they would just not seen to fit right. Take some luck to get them to fit.overall I use these during workouts and I feel that the cord that connects both earbuds together just has to much friction and seems to tug and pull when I turn my head. Sort of disappointed, I think they need to go back and refine this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Ray

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and best price on Amazon then anywhere else. Didn't give it a 5 stars because the right side kept falling off my ear. They need to make an insert for super tiny ear canals. The variety of sizes that are provided with the ear buds are all average to large.
customer_reviews.author: Lili Hamada

customer_reviews.title: SOUNDED AWESOME! however....
customer_reviews.text: this sounded awesome however, the fact that bluetooth connectivity kept disconnecting really really sucked a lot, not to mention their not the most comfortable in-ear's in the world
customer_reviews.author: Devon A.

customer_reviews.title: I liked the fit to my ear and they held well ...
customer_reviews.text: They seemed to be be OK, I did not use them much, I am giving this review for the guys with big necks out there that might be considering these earbuds. I have a 22 inch neck and the magnets would barely come together but they aren't strong enough to hold. The little bit I listened to and the installed process and pairing to my Note 4 were all OK. I liked the fit to my ear and they held well even without the wings. Couldn't tell they were there for the short time I used them.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger M.

customer_reviews.title: Three pair died within 15 months.
customer_reviews.text: Avoid these like the plague. I had a set die on me 3 months after purchase and was replaced under warranty. The replacement died two days outside of the original warranty period and Jabra refused to replace them. Same type of failure. Will not turn on and will not charge. Will never buy anything from this company again. Followup: They did replace the replacements that failed. However, the replacement for the replacement died within a month of receipt. I'm just out of luck at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Richard - Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: really want to love this item
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like these headphones but I have 2 major gripes first is the earwigs keep falling off (too the point that I have lost one side) and the second and biggest gripe is that the audio keeps cutting out when its in my pocket (pants or hoodie) and even cuts out when I hold it my left hand... That's just bad...I am still under warranty and I have to make a phone call to customer service, I hope that I have a lemon and this isn't what they normally push out...
customer_reviews.author: Rahul

customer_reviews.title: Dose not worthet
customer_reviews.text: The headphones get hot after 10 min of use The base is too high in my opinion wich cause me a headache so i gave it to my brother as a gift The app is not working at all
customer_reviews.author: royal

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Sound good, but is convenient because the heavy weight.I do not recommend buying it
customer_reviews.author: mona

customer_reviews.title: Build and Sound Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Good build and sound quality, can't complain there. Came with two sets of ear silicon tips and a pair of ear hooks, just wish it came with more, overall I'm satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: EL Fuego

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They didn't work. I wanted another pair but the company I purchased them from refunded my money.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Isaac Roussell

customer_reviews.title: He said the quality is really good and the battery is long
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my uncle. He said the quality is really good and the battery is long :)
customer_reviews.author: RyuushenTop Contributor: Manga

customer_reviews.title: Feels great, sound great.
customer_reviews.text: I wish they don't wake up so easily, sometimes i find myself wanting to use them and is out of battery. They are somewhat heavy but you need to find the right fit for you.
customer_reviews.author: Erick

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for wireless headphones but still would choose wired ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for wireless headphones but still would choose wired as the sound quality is better and I feel like these are more breakable so I use these on special occasions rather than 24/7
customer_reviews.author: David Castle

customer_reviews.title: https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00IL7B2YM/ref=oh_aui_detailpage_o00_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, after several attempts to run the handset time work and other handset expired now fail Nor will re-purchase you back He received because the handset and the defect It's back and operates more than GnRH I try to run it do not work and after working for the same because they are no defective from the inside now the headset in Junk Facility photo showing the final handset malfunction
customer_reviews.author: rmdanz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with the sound. Could use a little more bass, but hard to complain given the fact its Bluetooth. The overall experience is very good. The fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: super laggy
customer_reviews.text: the quality and sound is very good, however more than 50% of the time there is like a 3+ minute lag. it drives me crazy. if i try to pause or skip a song it can take up to a few minutes before the phone recognizes the pause or song skip buttons. sometimes it even takes up to 3 minutes for the audio to even start playing. i am about to switch back to wired earbuds because the lag is so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan P.

customer_reviews.title: Peace of crap
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good, but the little wings to keep them in you ears keep coming out so the headset is coming out, specially when you are sweading and using sunscreen. DON'T BUY IT! You will waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Lynn

customer_reviews.title: works great except when my phone is in my back pocket ...
customer_reviews.text: works great except when my phone is in my back pocket or on a bike ride. signal has a hard time going through dense body tissue. this is easily fixed by moving the device transmitting closer to the headphones. these work great (even though i've lost 3 rubber pieces that help the iems stay in my ears)
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, also on high volume
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, also on high volume, have all the gesture from the control buttons (stop/play etc), come with few adapters for maximum fitment to the ears. running add GYM with them, and it just perfect, not get loose on the ears,s as well give good environment isolation.
customer_reviews.author: Idan

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied. Never powered on.
customer_reviews.text: Charged overnight but would not power on at all. Product was defective upon delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Mike J.

customer_reviews.title: Loved this product!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a Christmas present and really enjoyed giving them to my dad because these headphones are the best. They are noise canceling so when you have them in and the music is on you can't hear anything. Better to use when you don't want to hear surrounding noise.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M. Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: good but too weak
customer_reviews.text: it is good but the USB connection is too weak and easy to broken. When using this product, be gentle to put out the USB jack.
customer_reviews.author: Eury Kim

customer_reviews.title: Hard to keep on the ears
customer_reviews.text: Sound great if one can keep them in one's ears.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Settle

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but didn't fit me right.
customer_reviews.text: The products packing was done really well, but other than that I didn't like the fit. No matter what earbuds I used, something didn't feel right. I returned these and got the Jaybirds Bluebuds instead. Defiantly worth the extra $20.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Thaler

customer_reviews.title: Sound is good. The wire drive me nut
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good. The wire drive me nut. Its not flexible enough or too rigid! It curl up to my chin every time I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Dao

customer_reviews.title: It is a great product to me by all means
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product to me by all means. Sound quality may not be the best (as I am not an audio engineer who can differentiate b/w different techs) but is very satisfying and strong. I love its sound. It gets a very nice grip in the ear and never comes off even if you jump, run, shake your head like crazy etc. Battery life is good enough, as well. I'm highly satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: The Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought a refurb pair v2.50, and they still outperform JBL Reflect Mini BT in all areas.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: I literally love them! Been using them for a year now
customer_reviews.text: I literally love them! Been using them for a year now, basically every single day and I tell you this headphones are the best I ever had. I used to be Beats user... But this is just way better in terms of price, battery (about 6 to 8 hours) and sound quality (the bass is insane good, no lie).
customer_reviews.author: victor david

customer_reviews.title: Above Average
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but the sound quality is not as good as I had hoped. One charge lasts about 4 hours. Connects easily and quickly to my iPhone 6.
customer_reviews.author: RATE IT 4 U

customer_reviews.title: Assume that they're only good for a year.
customer_reviews.text: Jabra's support is limited to only their one-year warranty. When mine broke beyond that I was told they have no way to repair or provide any other response beyond buying another pair. Not something I'll ever do from Jabra again.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Nice sounding but....
customer_reviews.text: Was really impressed with packaging and metallic look of the headphones. As for fit i usually dont have problems with buds, I have given up trying to find a comfortable fit, each one is painfull and does not stay in . I have started using the winged pieces from my bose headphones. The headphones also skip alot.
customer_reviews.author: montanapow

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioning at the first day of usage
customer_reviews.text: I have received this item and found that one of the earbud has intermittent issue with the wire, this does not work all the time which makes the item a garbage since I can not return it as I a, outside of US for a while. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandr Boikov

customer_reviews.title: Not designed for really small ears.
customer_reviews.text: I have really small ears and I tried every earbud tip and combination but could not keep them in my ears. When I managed to get them to stay briefly I could not hear any bass unless I held my hands over my ears. These earbud are not designed for really small ears.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa C Sandidge

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I'm looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is what exactly I'm looking for the earphone, It is easy to use and great sound, no delay when playing the video clip (using with Note 3). Also with the convenience function that I can stop listening by use the magnetic to switch on-off the music.
customer_reviews.author: Anotherhand

customer_reviews.title: Looking nice but not working nice
customer_reviews.text: The headset look nice and perfect but there is to much problem with it .. Bad sound sync when i watch videos and to much cutting in connection .. Also in phone call the other side they cant hear me 😪 i really sorry because i buy it 😤
customer_reviews.author: Ali Chabuk

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: A Hassel.. Don't stay around ur neck if not connected.. Which turns it off .lol
customer_reviews.author: PuddenTang Craves

customer_reviews.title: Now they are garbage....
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones, but the pair I received from Amazon warehouse last 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby D

customer_reviews.title: they fall out all the time and you can lose ...
customer_reviews.text: they fall out all the time and you can lose the wings fall off sounds ok there is a delay when you diel from a iPhone 6 plus they are water proof
customer_reviews.author: poparthouse

customer_reviews.title: Good Item. Good seller
customer_reviews.text: Excellent this item. Very fast shipping. Thank you to the seller. NOTE: When installing the headset on the ear may feel slight pain and it was due to the installation method.
customer_reviews.author: aziz babqi

customer_reviews.title: Finally the volume boost cold be a little louder but better than most wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: I listen to lots of audiobooks the headphones are constructed very well but I experienced signal drop out just for a second or two then reconnects with the phone in my pocket. Finally the volume boost cold be a little louder but better than most wireless headphones...
customer_reviews.author: Bradley W Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time. Price really cheap for the number ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Price really cheap for the number of pieces included in the outfit.
customer_reviews.author: BogsJJ

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for what you get!
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Felt it was overpriced for quality. The ear buds are hard. Not one pair fit right. I used the buds from my beats.
customer_reviews.author: LuAnn Weis

customer_reviews.title: Evetything is OK, except of ear wings. For ...
customer_reviews.text: Evetything is OK, except of ear wings. For some reason I got 2 pairs of "small" size earwings and no one "medium" size...
customer_reviews.author: Vadim

customer_reviews.title: i'd rather go with BOSE
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my bf. He's got hard time finding perfect headphones coz of the structure of his ear helix. The earphone tips that Jabra has are not as comfy as let's say Bose ones. Jabra's earphones are vey heavy and massy so your ears start hurting after having them in for at least half an hour. As far as for sound quality, again by comparing Jabra and Bose i would still go with Bose. So eventually my bf is trying to get rid of these Jabra headphones and buy so far the winning BOSE!
customer_reviews.author: Mura

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: sound was great but didnt stay in my ear well
customer_reviews.author: Devil Sayian

customer_reviews.title: Breaking my heart
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones however the ear pieces fall off all the time complained to Jabra and they just said to buy their accessory pack. A total money making scam. Look at other options
customer_reviews.author: Scott Muirson

customer_reviews.title: Audio issues
customer_reviews.text: Its a love hate relationship with these...sometimes I'll be lucky enough to have the right side working; it'll beep to confirm volume but it won't play music. But when it does work it's the best headohones I ever purchased

product_meta.title: Jabra ROX Wireless Bluetooth Stereo Earbuds (Black)
product_meta.description: Drop the wires and enjoy rich sound. Lightweight, durable, and comfortable. When you're done, snap the special earbud magnets together to save battery.
feature_bullets: Small wireless earbuds that pack massive sound
Crafted with rugged materials for an active lifestyle
In-line controls for easy music and call management
Maximum comfort with ColorCore Eargels and EarWings that lock into place
Power saving magnets put battery into sleep mode when earphones are not in use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars453 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Protective Bag, Eargel Pack, Jabra Rox Wireless Bluetooth Stereo Earbuds
